About Me

I am Mohammed Hafeez and I am a Mechanical Engineer. I hold a degree in Masters of Science in Mechanical Engineering from University at Buffalo(SUNY) and a degree in Bachelors of Technology in Mechanical Engineering from PES University. I have specializations in dynamics and control as well as automotive engineering and I have the necessary skills to integrate my education in the industry and I have a lot of research experience from various domains which have built my understanding of mechanical engineering and science as a whole.

Operational modal analysis

Performed experimental and simulation analysis by performing modal analysis of a bike chassis to find the mode shapes and natural frequencies of a bike chassis. A running engine was simulated on the chassis to see how it alters the natural frequencies of a chassis.

CATIA V5 R20 HyperMesh ANSYS MeScope

Effect of Toe Camber and Caster

Studied the effects of Toe, Camber and Caster angles on the vehicle performance for different classes of vehicles ranging from Sedans to SUV’s.

MATLAB Tire Dynamics Automotive design

Vibration pattern of a membrane

Analyzed mode shapes of a circular membrane by impinging sound generated waves on the surface with the help of a speaker within a circular tube.

MATLAB Modal Analysis

Prosthetic design

Set up the design for a prosthetic which can be used for fixing Foot drop gait.

Prosthetic design Data Analysis Neurology

Satellite dynamics

Analyzed the path and maneuvering required for the orbital path of a service satellite to refuel an existing satellite.

MATLAB Space Dynamics Orbital Maneuvers node

Exoplanet detection and Orbital analysis

Determined which planets are habitable by classifying them as planets or exo space objects and comparing them to the dynamics of the Earth as a reference.

MATLAB Data Analysis Earth Dynamics Orbital planning

Travelling wave generation

Simulated a travelling wave on the surface of a plate which is to be replicated on the surface of an aircraft wing to promote better boundary layer control. This is used to improve flight performance for high speed travel.

CATIA V5 R21 ANSYS MATLAB COMSOL

PCB Board design

Calculated the thermal dissipative properties of PCB boards to prevent overheating during usage in Telecom towers.

Thermodynamics

Physics of Robots

Designed a compliant robot to analyze the working and stress limits of the mechanism. Further researched dynamical properties of jumping robots

CATIA V5 R20 MATLAB 3D Printing
